caption.p: Texas and Harris County diagnosis-based human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) care continuum, 2018. Data source [ 5]; HIV diagnosed = persons with HIV alive at year-end 2018; Met need = ≥1 CD4 or viral load (VL) test during 2018; Retained in care = ≥2 CD4 or VL tests performed at least 3 months apart during 2018. Virally suppressed = VL test <200 copies/mL in 2018.
